p.seg: Being desirous of admission into the ROYAL GEOGRAPHICAL SOCIETY, We, the undersigned, recommend him as likely to become a useful and valuable Fellow.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0.0154in; text-indent: 0in;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0in; margin-right: 0.0154in; text-indent: 0in;

cell.p:
(Signed) Ferd von Mueller
M's name is in the hand that completed the certificate.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

note.p: No election date is entered on the face of the certificate, but it is recorded on the back of the certificate as 'Jany 31st.'

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.1665in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.1665in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: There is another certificate for MacIvor; see M to the Royal Geographical Society, 1 October 1880 (in this edition as 80-10-01a).
